snippet: A group of more than 30 technology industry leaders has endorsed an effort to overhaul New York State’s campaign-finance laws, and is urging Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to push for a system of public financing for state elections. Read more »
abstract: A group of more than 30 technology industry leaders has endorsed an effort to overhaul New York State’s campaign-finance laws, and is urging Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to push for a system of public financing for state elections. Read more »
lead_paragraph: A group of more than 30 technology industry leaders has endorsed an effort to overhaul New York State’s campaign-finance laws, and is urging Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to push for a system of public financing for state elections. Read more »

headline.main: New York Tech Leaders Endorse Campaign Finance Change
